Translate App | Google Translate for macOS

Translate App is a lightweight and powerful macOS application that gives users quick access to Google Translate right from the status bar. Designed for efficiency, it allows you to translate text from images and even supports voice translation with microphone permissions.

Features:

  • Quick Google Translate access: Instantly use Google Translate from your macOS status bar.
  • Image Translation: Open images to extract and translate text directly from them.
  • Launch on startup: Set the app to open automatically when you log in.
  • Integrated cookie management: Enjoy smoother functionality with built-in cookie management.
  • Swift concurrency model: Optimized with the latest Swift concurrency features for better performance.
  • Voice translation: The app can recognize and translate spoken words (microphone and speech recognition permissions required; Google login is necessary for voice translation).

How to Install:

  • Download
  • Move the Translate App to your Applications folder.
  • If you encounter a warning, go to your Mac‚Äôs Privacy & Security settings and allow the app to run.

Current Limitations:

  • File Downloads: This feature is not yet supported.

  • Voice translation macOS
